name: 12th International Conference on Signal Image Processing and Multimedia
content: 12th International Conference on Signal Image Processing and Multimedia (SIPM 2024) April 27 \~ 28, 2024, Copenhagen, Denmark https://acsit2024.org/sipm/index Scope 12th International Conference on Signal Image Processing and Multimedia (SIPM 2024) focuses on all technical and practical aspects of Signal Image Processing and Multimedia. The goal of this conference is to bring together researchers and practitioners from academia and industry to focus on understanding recent developments this area and establishing new collaborations in these areas. Authors are solicited to contribute to the conference by submitting articles that illustrate research results, projects, surveying works and industrial experiences that describe significant advances in the areas of Signal Image Processing and Multimedia & its applications.
